items.title_original: How Stablecoin Pegs Hold Under Normal Market Conditions
items.title_neutral: How Stablecoin Pegs Hold Under Normal Market Conditions
items.excerpt: Stablecoin pegs are maintained less by active redemption and more by liquidity, arbitrage, and shared market assumptions. Under normal conditions, belief and market behavior do most of the work long before issuer reserves are touched.
